creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: grouping of three ovals with three circles below, each showing a different biblical scene
inscription:
Inscription

-- possible partial mark (black stamp) on verso, lower left
-- in plate on recto, bottom margin: Callot fecit. | Israel ex. cum | privil. Regis.
provenance: John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie; gave to MIA, 2015. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: Ovals and Rondels from the Mysteries of the Passion of Jesus Christ, and the Life of the Virgin
